# Wrapper for PDF.js providing an annotation API

This repository is part of the [EDUTIEK project](https://www.edutiek.de) and is used by the following components:

* [long-essay-assessment-writer](https://github.com/EDUTIEK/long-essay-assessment-writer)
* [assessment-writer](https://github.com/EDUTIEK/assessment-writer)

At the moment we don't recommend its use as a dependency outside the project. The API is tested with these components and may change at any time if needed by the project.
